email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15th-20th October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for our budget. Would you consider coming down to the low $50s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for your response. I can lower the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton, but that's the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

$50.75 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for 15th-20th October? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15th-20th October, and the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. I'll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there's anything else you need.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment.

Best,
John
